campaignPreset.title: 4 - Campaign Operations Preset
campaignPreset.description:
This preset follows the rules from the official Campaign Operations manual, designed for human GMs managing CamOps campaigns in MekHQ.

It assumes you own the Campaign Operations manual and are prepared to GM and manually roll for any missing or incomplete mechanics.

This preset is NOT recommended for most MekHQ players.
